name: Frost (itch) (Utdcus)
description:
Lost in a cold cave, the player almost froze to death. Fortunately, he found hope in a lone campfire. Battling hisway through the snow enemies, moving through the freezing snow, sliding on thin ice, he made his way to safety. Can you help him get to safety?

Controls:

WASD, Space

Note:

There are still some visual bugs in the game, but it shouldn't affect gameplay. Let me know if there are any bugs not related to visuals. Please give feedback on the game if you have time.

Other infomation:

This game was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020

Font used:  https://www.dafont.com/snowinter.font
